text: (yākūb nabi tama putun edāḷos denāgen yūsufvada, bunyāmīnvada adhika vaśayen ādaraya kirīma gæna avadhānaya kaḷa anit putun īrṣyā kara) “api śaktivantayin vaśayen siṭiyadī yūsufda, ohugē sahōdarayāda apagē piyāṭa apaṭa vaḍā adhika vaśayen kæmættaṭa pātra vūvan vaśayen siṭinnāha. (mehi) apagē piyā niyata vaśayenma prakaṭa væræddehi siṭinnēya”
